Html:
When I drop a .docx file, I get this:
Firefox can't find the file at /C:/DOCUME~1/P/LOCALS~1/Temp/DocX794266044/output.xhtml.

Although that directory is created, and it contains four subdirectories and three files... output.xhtml is not one of them.

Extension was installed here:
C:\Documents and Settings\P\Application Data\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\1uxck8l8.Default User\extensions\OpenXMLViewer@Codeplex.com\plugins
Me either. All I get is code. But the program installed without a hitch.
Could you kindly provide more details with respect to the OS version, Firefox version, screenshots if possible, and the contents of the OpenXMLViewer@Codeplex.com\plugins folder?

Same here. Win XP Home w/SP3 & Firefox 3.0.12

13 FIles in 5 Folders were created.  No output file.

Tiny one-page text document.  MS Word converter fine on file, used as my workaround.  Uninstalling this extension.
